name: Sony Alpha a7 IV Mirrorless Camera
description: The true hybrid powerhouse, pairing a 33MP full-frame sensor with advanced 4K 60p video. A top choice for professionals who need excellence in both stills and video.

name: Nikon Z8 Mirrorless Camera
description: Often called a 'baby Z9', the Z8 packs a 45.7MP stacked sensor, internal 8K N-RAW video, and a blackout-free viewfinder into a more compact body. Built for demanding professionals.

name: Leica M11 Rangefinder Camera
description: A modern take on a legendary design. The M11 combines the classic, manual rangefinder experience with a 60MP sensor and exceptional build quality. A true photographer's camera.

name: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera
description: A landmark camera known for its high-resolution 45MP sensor and groundbreaking 8K video capabilities. Its Dual Pixel AF II system is a class leader in speed and accuracy.

name: Hasselblad X2D 100C Medium Format Camera
description: Experience unparalleled image quality with a 100-megapixel medium format sensor. The X2D 100C delivers stunning color, detail, and dynamic range in a surprisingly portable design.

name: Fujifilm GFX 100S II Medium Format Camera
description: Bringing medium format to more creators, the GFX 100S II features a 102MP sensor, powerful in-body stabilization, and fast autofocus in a body size comparable to a full-frame DSLR.

name: Leica Q3 Digital Camera
description: A masterpiece of compact engineering. The Q3 features a 60MP full-frame sensor paired with a fixed, razor-sharp Summilux 28mm f/1.7 lens. The ultimate travel and street photography camera.

name: Nikkor Z 50mm f/1.8 S Lens
description: The standard prime lens for the Nikon Z system, offering exceptional sharpness, beautiful rendering, and a versatile focal length for everything from portraits to landscapes.

name: Canon RF 24-70mm f/2.8 L IS USM Lens
description: The essential professional zoom. This lens combines a fast f/2.8 aperture with image stabilization, delivering incredible image quality and low-light performance.

name: Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM Lens
description: The G Master portrait lens. Renowned for its extreme sharpness and breathtakingly smooth bokeh, this lens is a must-have for professional portrait and wedding photographers.

name: Fujifilm XF 16-55mm f/2.8 R LM WR Lens
description: A flagship standard zoom for the X-mount system. This weather-resistant lens provides flagship image quality with a constant f/2.8 aperture.

name: Hasselblad XCD 4/45P Lens
description: The world's lightest digital medium format autofocus lens. This 45mm lens provides a normal field of view and incredible image quality in an exceptionally compact package.

name: Panasonic Lumix S5 IIX Full-Frame Camera
description: A video-focused hybrid camera with features like internal ProRes recording, live streaming capabilities, and a highly effective phase-detect autofocus system.

name: Sigma 35mm f/1.4 DG DN Art Lens
description: Part of Sigma's renowned Art line, this lens offers outstanding optical performance that rivals first-party lenses, at a more accessible price point. For Sony E and L-Mount.

name: Tamron 28-75mm f/2.8 Di III VXD G2 Lens
description: A versatile and compact standard zoom for Sony E-mount cameras. The second generation model features improved optics and faster autofocus.

name: Nikon Zf Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: A fusion of classic, retro design and modern mirrorless technology. Features a 24.5MP sensor and dedicated dials for a tactile shooting experience.

name: Canon RF 50mm f/1.8 STM Lens
description: The 'nifty fifty' for the RF mount. Incredibly compact, lightweight, and affordable, this lens is a must-have for any Canon mirrorless shooter.

name: Sony Alpha a6700 APS-C Mirrorless Camera
description: A feature-packed APS-C camera with AI-powered autofocus from Sony's high-end models, 4K 120p video, and a compact form factor.

name: Fujifilm X100VI Digital Camera
description: The highly sought-after premium compact camera, featuring a 40MP sensor, in-body image stabilization, and classic film simulation modes in a beautiful, retro body.

name: Leica Summilux-M 35mm f/1.4 ASPH. Lens
description: A legendary lens for the Leica M-system, known for its exceptional sharpness, beautiful rendering, and compact size. A masterclass in optical design.

name: Nikon Z 14-24mm f/2.8 S Lens
description: A professional ultra-wide angle zoom for the Nikon Z system. Delivers stunning edge-to-edge sharpness for landscape, architecture, and astrophotography.

name: Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8 L IS USM Lens
description: A revolutionary telephoto zoom lens that is significantly smaller and lighter than its DSLR counterparts without sacrificing image quality.

name: Sony FE 16-35mm f/2.8 GM II Lens
description: The second generation of Sony's professional wide-angle zoom, now smaller, lighter, and with even better optical performance.

name: Fujifilm X-S20 Mirrorless Camera
description: A versatile camera aimed at content creators, featuring a large battery, a dedicated 'Vlog Mode', and a 26.1MP sensor.

name: Sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 DG DN Art Lens
description: A high-performance standard zoom lens that offers exceptional value and image quality for Sony E and L-mount systems.

name: Panasonic Lumix GH6 Mirrorless Camera
description: A video creator's dream, the GH6 offers a vast array of professional video formats, including 5.7K Apple ProRes, and features a built-in cooling fan for unlimited recording.

name: Tamron 70-180mm f/2.8 Di III VXD Lens
description: A compact and lightweight telephoto zoom for Sony E-mount, providing a fast f/2.8 aperture in a more portable package than traditional 70-200mm lenses.

name: Nikon Zfc APS-C Mirrorless Camera
description: A stylish, retro-themed camera inspired by the classic Nikon FM2 film camera, featuring modern mirrorless internals and a 20.9MP sensor.

name: Canon EOS R7 APS-C Mirrorless Camera
description: A high-performance APS-C camera designed for wildlife and sports photographers, featuring a 32.5MP sensor, dual card slots, and advanced autofocus.

name: Sony Alpha a7C II Compact Full-Frame Camera
description: Packing the 33MP sensor of the a7 IV into a much smaller, rangefinder-style body. Perfect for travelers who demand full-frame quality.

name: Fujifilm XF 56mm f/1.2 R WR Lens
description: A weather-resistant update to a classic portrait lens. This lens is renowned for its sharpness and beautiful rendering for portraiture.

name: Leica SL2-S Mirrorless Camera
description: A versatile full-frame camera for both photographers and videographers, featuring a 24.6MP sensor and robust, weather-sealed metal construction.

name: Nikkor Z 24-120mm f/4 S Lens
description: An incredibly versatile 'do-it-all' travel zoom lens, offering a wide focal range with a constant f/4 aperture and excellent image quality.

name: Canon RF 100-500mm f/4.5-7.1 L IS USM Lens
description: A super-telephoto zoom lens that offers an impressive reach in a relatively compact package, ideal for wildlife and sports photography.

name: Sony FE 50mm f/1.2 GM Lens
description: A G Master prime lens that achieves the coveted f/1.2 aperture for incredible low-light performance and subject separation, while remaining surprisingly compact.

name: Hasselblad 907X & CFV 100C Camera
description: A modular medium format system combining a digital back with a compact camera body, offering a unique, waist-level shooting experience with modern technology.

name: Panasonic Lumix S 50mm f/1.8 Lens
description: A lightweight, affordable, and high-performing standard prime lens for the L-mount system, perfect for everyday photography.

name: Sigma 150-600mm f/5-6.3 DG DN OS Sports Lens
description: A super-telephoto zoom for Sony E and L-mount, designed for sports and wildlife photographers who need extreme reach and fast autofocus.

name: Ricoh GR IIIx Digital Camera
description: A cult-classic street photography camera featuring a large APS-C sensor and a sharp 40mm equivalent lens in a truly pocketable body.

name: Tamron 35-150mm f/2-2.8 Di III VXD Lens
description: A unique and versatile all-in-one zoom lens for Sony E-mount, covering a wide range of focal lengths with an impressively bright aperture.

name: Nikon Z9 Flagship Mirrorless Camera
description: Nikon's top-tier professional camera, featuring a 45.7MP stacked sensor, no mechanical shutter, 8K video, and a rugged, integrated-grip body.

name: Canon RF 15-35mm f/2.8 L IS USM Lens
description: A professional ultra-wide angle zoom for the RF mount, offering a fast f/2.8 aperture and image stabilization for sharp shots in any condition.

name: Sony Alpha 1 (a1) Mirrorless Camera
description: The ultimate flagship, combining a 50MP high-resolution sensor with blazing-fast 30fps shooting and 8K video. A camera that truly does it all.

name: Fujifilm XF 23mm f/1.4 R LM WR Lens
description: A premium wide-angle prime lens for the X-mount system, updated with a new optical design, faster linear motor autofocus, and weather resistance.

name: Leica M6 Film Rangefinder Camera (2022 Reissue)
description: A faithful reissue of the legendary M6 film camera. It offers the purely mechanical, manual photography experience that generations of photographers have cherished.

name: Nikkor Z 70-200mm f/2.8 VR S Lens
description: The quintessential telephoto zoom for professionals using the Nikon Z system, delivering outstanding sharpness, speed, and performance.

name: Canon EOS R3 Mirrorless Camera
description: A professional camera built for speed, featuring a stacked sensor, Eye Control AF, and a weather-sealed body with an integrated grip.

name: Sony FE 35mm f/1.4 GM Lens
description: A compact and lightweight G Master prime that delivers exceptional resolution and beautiful bokeh, making it a favorite for a wide range of applications.

name: Hasselblad XCD 3.5/30mm Lens
description: A high-performance wide-angle lens for the X System, providing exceptional image quality from corner to corner.

name: Panasonic Lumix G9 II Mirrorless Camera
description: A powerful Micro Four Thirds camera with advanced phase-detect autofocus, incredible in-body stabilization, and fast burst shooting.

name: Sigma 85mm f/1.4 DG DN Art Lens
description: A reimagined portrait prime for mirrorless systems, offering stunning Art-line image quality in a significantly smaller and lighter package.

name: Fujifilm X-H2S Mirrorless Camera
description: A speed-focused flagship for the X-mount, featuring a stacked 26.1MP sensor capable of shooting up to 40fps and recording high-frame-rate video.

name: Nikkor Z 400mm f/2.8 TC VR S Lens
description: A flagship super-telephoto prime lens with a built-in 1.4x teleconverter, offering incredible reach and image quality for professional sports and wildlife photographers.

name: Canon RF 5.2mm f/2.8 L Dual Fisheye 3D VR Lens
description: A unique lens that captures stereoscopic 3D 180° VR imagery onto a single full-frame sensor, simplifying the workflow for creating immersive content.

name: Sony Alpha 7R V (a7R V) Mirrorless Camera
description: Combining a high-resolution 61MP sensor with a new AI-powered processing unit for incredibly advanced subject recognition and autofocus tracking.

name: Leica Summicron-M 50mm f/2 Lens
description: The benchmark for standard prime lenses, the Summicron is celebrated for its exceptional sharpness, contrast, and compact mechanical design.

name: Tamron 50-400mm f/4.5-6.3 Di III VC VXD Lens
description: An ultra-telephoto zoom lens for Sony E-mount that starts at a standard 50mm, offering unprecedented versatility for travel and wildlife.

name: Fujifilm X-H2 Mirrorless Camera
description: The high-resolution sibling to the X-H2S, featuring a class-leading 40MP APS-C sensor for incredible detail in stills and 8K video recording.

name: Nikon Z 180-600mm f/5.6-6.3 VR Lens
description: An accessible super-telephoto zoom lens that provides immense reach for wildlife, aviation, and sports photography enthusiasts.

name: Canon RF 28-70mm f/2 L USM Lens
description: A groundbreaking standard zoom lens with a constant f/2 aperture, offering the performance of multiple prime lenses in a single, professional-grade package.

name: Sony FE 200-600mm f/5.6-6.3 G OSS Lens
description: A popular super-telephoto zoom for wildlife and sports, known for its internal zoom mechanism, fast autofocus, and excellent sharpness.

name: Panasonic Lumix S1H Full-Frame Camera
description: A Netflix-approved cinema camera in a mirrorless body, offering a wide range of recording formats, including 6K video, and robust heat management.

name: Sigma 14-24mm f/2.8 DG DN Art Lens
description: An ultra-wide zoom lens for mirrorless systems that delivers exceptional image quality, making it a favorite for astrophotography and architecture.

name: Hasselblad XCD 4/21mm Lens
description: An extreme wide-angle lens for the X System, providing a 17mm full-frame equivalent field of view with outstanding optical correction.

name: Ricoh GR III Digital Camera
description: The quintessential pocketable street photography camera, featuring a 28mm equivalent lens and a large APS-C sensor for high-quality images.

name: Nikon D850 DSLR Camera
description: A legendary high-resolution DSLR, revered for its 45.7MP sensor, excellent dynamic range, and robust build quality. A workhorse for many professionals.

name: Canon EF 50mm f/1.2L USM Lens
description: A classic ultra-fast prime lens for Canon's EF mount, known for its dreamy rendering and incredible light-gathering capabilities.

name: Sony Alpha a7S III Mirrorless Camera
description: The king of low-light video. The a7S III features a 12MP sensor optimized for video, delivering clean 4K footage even at very high ISOs.

name: Fujifilm XF 90mm f/2 R LM WR Lens
description: A weather-resistant telephoto prime lens that is exceptionally sharp, making it a perfect choice for portraits and capturing fine details.

name: Leica Noctilux-M 50mm f/0.95 ASPH. Lens
description: An iconic, ultra-fast lens that creates a unique, unmistakable look with an extremely shallow depth of field. A lens for true artists.

name: Nikkor Z 85mm f/1.8 S Lens
description: A high-performance portrait lens for the Nikon Z system, offering excellent sharpness, pleasing bokeh, and a fast, silent autofocus motor.

name: Canon RF 100mm f/2.8 L MACRO IS USM Lens
description: A professional macro lens that offers up to 1.4x magnification, along with a Spherical Aberration control ring for adjusting bokeh.

name: Sony FE 135mm f/1.8 GM Lens
description: A G Master telephoto prime lens considered one of the sharpest lenses ever made, delivering incredible resolution and beautiful bokeh.

name: Hasselblad XCD 2,5/90V Lens
description: A fast and lightweight telephoto lens for the X System, perfect for portraits and close-up photography with its minimum focusing distance.

name: Panasonic Lumix S Pro 70-200mm f/2.8 O.I.S. Lens
description: A professional telephoto zoom for the L-mount system, offering a constant f/2.8 aperture and powerful image stabilization.

name: Sigma 20mm f/1.4 DG DN Art Lens
description: An ultra-wide prime lens with a very bright f/1.4 aperture, making it an excellent choice for astrophotography and low-light landscapes.

name: Fujifilm X-T30 II Mirrorless Camera
description: A compact and powerful camera that shares many features with the flagship X-T series, making it a popular choice for enthusiasts and travelers.

name: Nikon D6 DSLR Camera
description: Nikon's flagship professional DSLR, built for speed and reliability with the most advanced autofocus system in a Nikon DSLR.

name: Canon EOS-1D X Mark III DSLR Camera
description: The pinnacle of Canon's DSLR technology, offering incredible speed, a rugged build, and advanced connectivity for professional sports and photojournalism.

name: Sony Alpha 9 III Mirrorless Camera
description: The world's first full-frame camera with a global shutter sensor, enabling flash sync at any shutter speed and completely distortion-free images.

name: Leica APO-Summicron-M 50mm f/2 ASPH. Lens
description: Considered by many to be one of the most optically perfect lenses ever made, delivering unmatched sharpness and correction.

name: Tamron 150-500mm f/5-6.7 Di III VC VXD Lens
description: A compact super-telephoto zoom lens for Sony E-mount, offering great reach and image stabilization for wildlife and sports.

name: Nikkor Z MC 105mm f/2.8 VR S Lens
description: A professional-grade macro lens for the Z system, offering 1:1 life-size reproduction ratio and stunning image quality.

name: Fujifilm GFX 50S II Medium Format Camera
description: An accessible entry into the world of medium format photography, featuring a 51.4MP sensor and in-body image stabilization.

name: Canon RF 50mm f/1.2 L USM Lens
description: A legendary prime lens that redefined what was possible for a standard lens, with incredible sharpness even wide open at f/1.2.

name: Sony FE 24mm f/1.4 GM Lens
description: A wide-angle G Master prime that is both incredibly sharp and remarkably compact, perfect for landscapes, astrophotography, and vlogging.

name: Hasselblad XCD 2,8/135mm Lens
description: A telephoto lens for the X System that provides a 105mm full-frame equivalent field of view, ideal for portraits.

name: Panasonic Lumix S 24-105mm f/4 Macro O.I.S. Lens
description: A versatile standard zoom lens for the L-mount, covering a wide focal range with a constant f/4 aperture and useful macro capabilities.

name: Sigma 105mm f/2.8 DG DN Macro Art Lens
description: A dedicated macro lens for mirrorless systems that offers 1:1 magnification and exceptional Art-line image quality.

name: Nikon Z6 II Mirrorless Camera
description: A versatile and well-rounded full-frame camera, featuring dual processors, dual card slots, and excellent performance for both stills and video.

name: Canon EOS R8 Full-Frame Mirrorless Camera
description: A lightweight and affordable full-frame camera that inherits the powerful autofocus and sensor from the higher-end EOS R6 Mark II.

name: Sony Alpha a7CR Compact High-Resolution Camera
description: This camera puts the 61MP sensor from the a7R V into a compact, rangefinder-style body, creating a powerhouse for travel and landscape photographers.

name: Fujifilm XF 33mm f/1.4 R LM WR Lens
description: The new standard prime lens for the X-mount system, offering exceptional sharpness and a fast linear motor for quick, quiet autofocus.

name: Leica SL3 Mirrorless Camera
description: The latest in the SL line, featuring a 60MP sensor, phase-detect autofocus, and a new tilting screen while maintaining Leica's legendary build quality.

name: Nikkor Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S Lens
description: The professional workhorse zoom for the Nikon Z system, delivering uncompromising image quality, robust build, and a useful OLED information panel.

name: Canon RF 135mm f/1.8 L IS USM Lens
description: A telephoto prime lens designed for portraits, offering a flattering focal length, a very bright aperture, and effective image stabilization.

name: Sony FE 12-24mm f/2.8 GM Lens
description: An extreme ultra-wide angle zoom lens with a constant f/2.8 aperture, perfect for dramatic landscapes and architectural photography.

name: Hasselblad XCD 4/28P Lens
description: A wide-angle lens for the X System, offering a 22mm full-frame equivalent field of view in a very compact and lightweight design.

name: Panasonic Lumix S5 Full-Frame Camera
description: A compact and capable full-frame camera that offers excellent video features and image quality, making it a great value for hybrid shooters.

name: Sigma 50mm f/1.4 DG DN Art Lens
description: The Art-line standard prime for mirrorless, providing exceptional sharpness and optical performance that competes with the best.

name: Fujifilm GFX 100 II Medium Format Camera
description: A flagship medium format camera with a 102MP sensor, 8K video, and significantly improved autofocus and burst shooting capabilities.

name: Nikon Z 35mm f/1.8 S Lens
description: A high-quality wide-angle prime for the Z system, offering excellent sharpness and a popular focal length for everyday photography.

name: Canon EOS R5 C Cinema Camera
description: A true hybrid that combines the stills capabilities of the R5 with professional cinema features like a dedicated timecode port and active cooling.

name: Sony FE 20-70mm f/4 G Lens
description: A unique standard zoom that extends to an ultra-wide 20mm, making it an incredibly versatile lens for vlogging, travel, and landscapes.

name: Leica M-A (Typ 127) Film Camera
description: A purely mechanical film camera with no light meter or electronics. It is the ultimate expression of manual photography.

name: Tamron 17-70mm f/2.8 Di III-A VC RXD Lens
description: A versatile zoom lens for APS-C Sony E-mount cameras, offering a fast f/2.8 aperture and image stabilization.

name: Pentax K-1 Mark II DSLR Camera
description: A rugged, weather-sealed full-frame DSLR with a unique Pixel Shift Resolution system and built-in GPS and Astrotracer functions.

name: Sigma 18-50mm f/2.8 DC DN Contemporary Lens
description: An incredibly small and lightweight standard zoom for APS-C mirrorless cameras, featuring a constant f/2.8 aperture.

name: Nikon D780 DSLR Camera
description: A hybrid DSLR that incorporates mirrorless technology, featuring on-sensor phase-detect autofocus for excellent live view and video performance.

name: Canon RF 800mm f/11 IS STM Lens
description: A surprisingly compact and affordable super-telephoto prime lens, made possible by a fixed f/11 aperture and diffractive optics.

name: Sony Alpha 7C R + FE 40mm F2.5 G Lens Kit
description: A premium compact kit pairing the high-resolution 61MP a7CR with a small, high-quality 40mm prime lens.
